title: Flight Physics Trainee
description: Automated wind tunnel and flight test data modeling for: (i) HTP of A350XWB-900 and (ii) HTP and auxiliary fins of BelugaXL. Worklfow involved parsing data from multiple formats (XML, CDF, in-house text formats) and system identification of aerodynamic models using MATLAB.

title: R&D Software Engineer III
description: Developed simulation tools for additive molding. These tools ranged from a patent-pending topology optimization code to Abaqus plugins. Among others, used these tools for Northtrop Grumman and Airbus brackets.

title: R&D Advanced Simulations Manager
description: Built a team of 2 (including me) to develop and run simulation workflows for some of our most demanding customers in Silicon Valley on products that included composite phone enclosures, watch enclosures, AR/VR frames and footwear. Among them a solver-neutral workflow that translates composite material and fiber orientation cards from Abaqus to customer preferred FEA data.

title: Sr. Research Engineer, Experimental Mechanics
description: Currently standing up a Digital Image Correlation lab.
